name: Shleep
description:
A short journey adventure game that gets stranger and stranger as you play.

As you slowly fall into a deep sleep, help a lost sheep find its way DEEPER AND DEEPER into your dream world.

Made in one weekend for the Ludum Dare Game Jam 48

Theme:  Deeper and Deeper

Tileset by Kenney.nl

Background song by Cosmin Mirza (cosminmirza.com)
